Text: This is a fascinating game. Lin comes into the second period and it takes the rest of the Knicks quite a while to get used to him, to trust him. You watch them slowly warm to him. Thank you Nepotu, for this.

Nepotu, You're awesome! Thanks, DL'ing now but I'm sure it'll be great.  Much appreciation, I gave up my own search for this one when the overseas sites came up dry.  Way to look out for the minor desires/needs of a complete stranger! :) If only more of the world understood the concept... :)
